lyrics:
9 contributorsthe only one lyricsverse 1
hold up youre movin too fast
im up for something that last
i aint looking to screw on the first night
cause thats a nogo
and if the vibes good go to first base
cause the first kiss could be your last taste
i aint lookin to screw till the vibes right

chorus
see im the only one you know
that can put you on cruise control
yeah im the only one youll find
that wont waste all my time on nothin

refrain
nothin on nothin
nothin

verse 2
my will is stronger than most
i will not let you get close
until i think that you deserve me
cause thats a nogo
im gonna hold out so in the mean time
dont expect much from a strong mind
until i think that you deserve me
see limp bizkit liveget tickets as low as 14you might also likechorus
see im the only one you know
that can put you on cruise control
yeah im the only one youll find
that wont waste all my time

bridge
im holdin out im gonna wait
wanna make it past the first date
a little time then we can do
all the nasty things you wanna do
dont get me wrong just take my hand
and i really hope you understand
that its easier when every second counts
so well just have to wait
its really no big deal
its really no big deal

verse 3
id hate to get you in bed
find out youre empty instead
no need to knock another home run out
cause thats a nogo
and id hate to be so filthy
if we were not meant to be
no need to knock another home run out
chorus
see im the only one you know
that can put you on cruise control
yeah im the only one youll find
that wont waste all my time

outro
on nothin nothin
on nothin nothin
on nothin on nothin1embed
